name: Car Racing Highland
description:
Racing your dream muscle sport car on highland
Drive your muscle dream sports car around nice environment
This is very basic of race , rally muscle sports car game
Features:
- Amazing graphics of muscle sports car , nice highland environment
- Simple controls to control and drive your dream muscle sports car on nice environment of highland
- Gas, break buttons to control your racing , rally muscle sports car
- Automatic gear of your race , rally muscle sports car
- Swing your device to control your muscle sports car steer
- Camera button to change your view of race , rally muscle sports car
